title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Using Simbrief with B78XH mod
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how to plan a flight plan created using SimBrief can be loaded directly into our airplane using Heavy Divisions B78XH  addon for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020.

If you like to use the mod use link below to download it:

Heavy Division B87XH cockpit
https://github.com/Heavy-Division/B78XH

The tool used to plan our flight simBrief can be found here: https://www.simbrief.com
